TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GiveFeedbackEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 事件提供数据，该事件在拖动操作期间发生。

span.span: Provides data for the event, which occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖动操作期间发生的事件。The event occurs during a drag operation. 它可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈拖动事件的源。It allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. A对象指定的拖放操作和是否使用默认游标类型。A object specifies the type of drag-and-drop operation and whether default cursors are used. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Effect As DragDropEffects
public: property System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects Effect { System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects get(); };

summary.span: 获取显示的拖放操作反馈。

span.span: Gets the drag-and-drop operation feedback that is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseDefaultCursors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置拖动操作是否应使用与拖放效果关联的默认光标。

span.span: Gets or sets whether drag operation should use the default cursors that are associated with drag-drop effects.

value.span: 如果使用默认指针，值为 ；否则值为 。

span.span: if the default pointers are used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系统提供了默认拖放游标移动或复制等的不同的拖放操作。The system provides default drag-drop cursors for different drag-drop operations such as move or copy. 如果设置为`false`，它负责要设置合适的光标的事件源。If is set to `false`, it is the responsibility of the event source to set the appropriate cursor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler.
